actions.name: Use
actions.spellArea: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

system.shortDescription: This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.fwbgmfya11gtko14]{eldritch conduit} save for the differences listed above and that the target must be within medium range (100 ft. + 10 ft./level) in order for you to use the conduit. Using a creature as a conduit for a spell ends the greater eldritch conduit effect on that creature, but does not end the effect for other eldritch conduits.
